summary: A comprehensive test suite for the VizTracer library that validates core tracing capabilities, decorator behavior, pause/resume, function ignoring, trace saving, fork handling, instant entry management, global tracer access, and context manager integration across various execution contexts.
business_intent: To verify the correctness, stability, and feature completeness of the VizTracer tracing tool by exercising its API in unit tests, ensuring reliable performance monitoring and profiling in diverse scenarios.
